thread.title: David Cummings
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by David Cummings

author: David Cummings
title: David Cummings
text: I ordered two different types of T shirts I designed. One was a black with white ringer T, and the other was a plain red. Both have a design on the front and back, and they look Amazing!!! I couldn't believe what a great job they did. My design was a little pixelated but they made it really smooth and perfect! I couldn't have asked for a better experience. You approve the proof before the shirts are ever made, and they were completely helpful in the whole process. Amazing Job!!
